Asare Akuffo bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego na Ghana, onye na-echekwa ego na onye ọchụnta ego. Ọ bụbu onye isi nchịkwa nke Home Finance Company, ugbu a ụlọ akụ Republic bụ ụlọ akụ ọsụ ụzọ na ụlọ ọrụ ego ụlọ. Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Private Enterprise Foundation, ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa na Ghana.
Akuffo nwetara akara ugo mmụta na nchịkwa nchịkwa na Mahadum Ghana yana asambodo na Housing Finance na Mahadum Pennsylvania
Ọ bụ onye Akaụntụ Chartered na onye otu Institute of Chartered Accountants, Ghana
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Swedru
Akuffo bụ onye Presbyterian siri ike ma na-efe Covenant Presby Church Dzorwulu
Ọ bụ onye isi ụkọchukwu nke Covenant Presbyterian Church nke Gnana, Dzorwulu.
Dr Asare Akuffo lụrụ Mrs Asare Akuvfo ma nwee ụmụ atọ
Na June 3, 2019, a kọrọ na ọ nwụọla.
